title: 1936–37 Panhellenic Championship
text:
The 1936–37 <a href="Super%20League%20Greece">Panhellenic Championship</a> was the 8th season of the highest <a href="Association%20football">football</a> league of Greece. The champions of the 3 founding Associations of the <a href="Hellenic%20Football%20Federation">HFF</a> participated in the championship, which were the <a href="Athens%20Football%20Clubs%20Association">Αthenian</a>, the <a href="Piraeus%20Football%20Clubs%20Association">Piraeus'</a> and the <a href="Macedonia%20Football%20Clubs%20Association">Macedonian</a> association. <a href="Olympiacos%20F.C.">Olympiacos</a> won the championship, for the fifth time in its history and for the first time undefeated. The point system was: "Win: 2 points" - "Draw: 1 point" - "Loss: 0 points".

Piraeus Football Clubs Association.
